snippets.title: Alert: Action
snippets.code: Actionable Alert with a button for quick user interaction.

snippets.title: Alert: Dissmisible
snippets.code: Dismissible User can dismiss this alert.

snippets.title: Alert: Information
snippets.code: Information Body text starts on the same row as heading. A link (optional) always ends the message.

snippets.title: Alert: Negative
snippets.code: Negative Error message requiring user attention.

snippets.title: Alert: Notice
snippets.code: Notice Body text with link or additional context.

snippets.title: Alert: Positive
snippets.code: Positive Feedback message with optional CTA.

snippets.title: Alert: Warning
snippets.code: Warning Important information to consider.

snippets.title: Badge: Lead
snippets.code:
<gds-flex gap="xl">
  <gds-badge variant="positive">
    <gds-icon-rocket slot="lead"></gds-icon-rocket>
    Launched
  </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="negative">
    <gds-icon-triangle-exclamation slot="lead">
    </gds-icon-triangle-exclamation>
    Overdue
  </gds-badge>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Badge: Notification
snippets.code:
<gds-flex gap="xl" align-items="center">
  <gds-badge variant="negative" notification=""></gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="negative" notification="">9</gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="negative" notification="">99+</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Badge: Rounded
snippets.code:
<gds-flex gap="xl" align-items="center">
  <gds-badge rounded="" variant="information"> 01 </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge rounded="" variant="notice"> 02 </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge rounded="" variant="positive"> 03 </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge rounded="" variant="warning"> 04 </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge rounded="" variant="negative"> 05 </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge rounded="" variant="negative" disabled=""> 06 </gds-badge>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Badge: Size
snippets.code:

</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Badge: Trail
snippets.code:
<gds-flex gap="xl">
  <gds-badge variant="positive">
    10,000.00

  </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="negative">
    142.00
    <gds-icon-arrow-right-down-circle slot="trail"></gds-icon-arrow-right-down-circle>

</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Badge: Variants

  <gds-badge variant="notice">

    Notice

  <gds-badge variant="positive">
    <gds-icon-circle-check slot="lead"></gds-icon-circle-check>
    Positive

  <gds-badge variant="warning">
    <gds-icon-circle-check slot="lead"></gds-icon-circle-check>
    Warning
  </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="negative">
    <gds-icon-triangle-exclamation slot="lead"></gds-icon-triangle-exclamation>
    Negative
  </gds-badge>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Button

  <gds-button size="small">Primary</gds-button>

snippets.title: Hero: Card
snippets.code:
<gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
    <gds-card
      variant="primary"
      border-color="primary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
      justify-content="flex-end"
      padding="s"
    >
      Primary
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      border-color="secondary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
      justify-content="flex-end"
      padding="s"
    >
      Secondary
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card
      variant="tertiary"
      border-color="tertiary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
      justify-content="flex-end"
      padding="s"
    >
      Tertiary
    </gds-card>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Form summary
snippets.code:
<form>
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="m" align-items="center" justify-content="center" max-width="300px">
    <input
      id="designation"
      type="text"
      aria-invalid="true"
      data-label="Designation"
      data-errormessage="A designation is required"
      required=""
      hidden
    />
    <gds-form-summary id="summary"></gds-form-summary>
  </gds-flex>
</form>

snippets.title: Hero: Grid
snippets.code:
<gds-grid columns="12" gap="xs" width="280px">
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="primary"
    grid-column="1/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="2xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Nav</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="primary"
    grid-column="1/5"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Sidebar</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="primary"
    grid-column="5/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Content</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
</gds-grid>

snippets.title: Hero: Link
snippets.code: <gds-link text-decoration="underline">Link text</gds-link>

snippets.title: Hero: Menu button
snippets.code:
<gds-card 
  width="max-content"
  flex-direction="row"
  variant="secondary"
  border-color="primary"
  padding="0"
  border="none"
  gap="0"
  height="max-content"
  overflow="hidden"
>
  <gds-menu-button compact selected>
    <gds-icon-bell slot="trail"></gds-icon-bell>
    Notification
  </gds-menu-button>
  <gds-popover>
    <gds-menu-button compact slot="trigger">
      <gds-icon-people slot="trail"></gds-icon-people>
      Profile
    </gds-menu-button>
    <gds-flex padding="m">Profile stuff</gds-flex>
  </gds-popover>
  <gds-menu-button
    href="https://github.com/seb-oss/green"
    compact
    target="_blank"
  >
    <gds-icon-square-arrow-top-right
      slot="trail"
    ></gds-icon-square-arrow-top-right>
    External
  </gds-menu-button>
</gds-card>

snippets.title: Hero: Popover
snippets.code:
<gds-popover>
  <gds-button rank="secondary" slot="trigger" size="small">
    Show popover
    <gds-icon-chevron-bottom slot="trail"></gds-icon-chevron-bottom>
  </gds-button>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    gap="s"
    padding="m"
    align-items="flex-start"
    width="280px"
  >
    <gds-text tag="h3">Custom popover!</gds-text>
    <gds-text tag="p"> Popover content </gds-text>
    <gds-button rank="primary">Action</gds-button>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-popover>

snippets.title: Hero: Select
snippets.code:
<gds-select plain width="280px">
  <gds-icon-books slot="lead"></gds-icon-books>
  <select>
    <option value="">Select a value</option>
    <optgroup label="Physics">
      <option value="quantum-mechanics">Quantum Mechanics</option>
      <option value="relativity">Relativity</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Chemistry">
      <option value="organic-chemistry">Organic Chemistry</option>
      <option value="inorganic-chemistry">Inorganic Chemistry</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Biology">
      <option value="genetics">Genetics</option>
      <option value="microbiology">Microbiology</option>
      <option value="ecology">Ecology</option>
    </optgroup>
  </select>
</gds-select>
